JSRDotNETSDK Reference

IS_PULSING Enumeration

See Also

Values that represent the current activity of the pulser. Some instruments do not have the ability to detect if an external trigger is active or not. However, if the internal trigger source is used, the instrument will report this property as active.

Namespace: JSRDotNETSDK
Assembly: JSRDotNETSDK (in JSRDotNETSDK.dll)

Members
  Member name Description
INACTIVE The pulser trigger circuit is not currently being triggered.
ACTIVE The pulser trigger circuit is being currently triggered.
UNKNOWN The hardware is unable to report if the pulser is triggered or not.
